issue.title: Literally does nothing...
issue.body:
I have installed this, and installed htmlbeautifier. I get no warnings but nothing happens when I click 'Format Document'.
How to debug this?

issue.title: Document how to format .html.erb files
issue.body:
It took me a while to figure out why it wasn't working on my `.html.erb` files, and I discovered I just had to add this to my `settings.json`:

```json
"files.associations": {
  "*.erb": "erb"
}
```
Otherwise it was counting them not as `erb` files, but `html.erb` files - it would be helpful to note this in the installation/config requirements.

issue.title: Document how to format .html.erb files
issue.body:
It took me a while to figure out why it wasn't working on my `.html.erb` files, and I discovered I just had to add this to my `settings.json`:

```json
"files.associations": {
  "*.erb": "erb"
}
```
Otherwise it was counting them not as `erb` files, but `html.erb` files - it would be helpful to note this in the installation/config requirements.

issue.title: Add support for htmlbeautifier options
issue.body:
Resolves #1

- Uses the same option names and defaults as htmlbeautifier.
- Removes empty tmp file left behind by htmlbeautifier if
  invalid nesting is encountered and stopOnErrors is set to true.

issue.title: Self closing tags
issue.body: Hi, this is a great plugin - I have one small issue - if the tag is self closing () is screws up the formatting (It's fine if I do this )

issue.title: Customize htmlbeautifier execution arguments
issue.body:
Hello and thanks for this plugin!

Do you have any plans to support custom execution arguments?

E.g. a settings option to edit the htmlbeautifier command line options, say, `htmlbeautifier -b 4`

Ty!
